attributes.action: Maajid Nawaz and offensive cartoon of Prophets Muhammad and Jesus
attributes.additional_details:
Maajid Nawaz who's chairman of the Quillium Foundation tweeted an offensive cartoon which depicted the Holy Prophets Muhammad and Jesus PBUH.

We as signatories to this petition object to this cartoon as it offends and hurts Muslims.   For it to be done by someone who has aspirations to be a politician and one that receives money from the taxpayer.
